TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebOperationContext extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IExtension`1<class System.ServiceModel.OperationContext>
Public Class WebOperationContext Implements IExtension(Of OperationContext)

Docs.summary: A helper class that provides easy access to contextual properties of Web requests and responses.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code shows how to retrieve the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch> instance associated with the Web operation context of the current call. The code also shows how to set the HTTP status for the outgoing response.
